11.content: Who do you shrink yourself with?
11.title: Shrink yourself

choices: Julia thinks you are a bug
111.content:
You had discovered a way to shrink down to just an inch tall. It's been your biggest fantasy (no pun intended) for as long as you can remember, and now you had bought a shrink ray to make it a reality. The only person you could think of to share this with was your girlfriend Julia. You went over her house shortly and you both went up to her bedroom.

"So, what did you want to show me John that was so important?" Julia said jokingly.
"You wouldn't believe me if I showed you, so let me show you." You responded. You set the shrink ray for bug size: one inch. You gave it to Julia. "Point this at me, then pull the trigger." Julia gave you the craziest look then pulled the trigger. All of a sudden there was a flash of white light. When your vision came back, when you looked around it looked like you were in a forest. It took you
second to realize you were in the carpet fibers! You looked further and saw Julia's gorgeous perfect feet as you stood as a bug down at her feet. You looked up and jumped up and down trying to get your massive girlfriend's attention as she looked around to see where her bug sized boyfriend had gone.
111.title: Julia

113.content: Who do you shrink with?
113.title: Someone at home

114.content: Who do you shrink with?

115.content: Who do you shrink with at work?
115.title: Someone at work

122.content:
Carly had asked you to come over. She said she needed help with a project and as her best friend you’re always there for her. You get there and she greets you at the door with black leggings and a revealing white tank top with socks on. I followed her up to her room, and she closed the door behind her.
“So what’s this project you were telling me about?” I asked
“Well, it’s really more an adventure. For you.” Carly giggled. I looked at her confused. “Don’t worry, you’ll know what I mean soon.” She finished seductively. She walked over to her bed and grabbed an odd looking gun. She pointed at you and gave you a wave. You saw a bright light and then you felt dizzy. When you came to you were on the cold ground, and you looked around and Carly’s room was so much bigger! You heard a laugh boom from above you. You turned around and the burnette giantess towered over you. You were truely a bug at your best friends feet.
“WOW YOU MUST BE AT LEAST AN INCH TALL NOW! MAYBE EVEN SMALLER!” Carly boomed
“W-why did you shrink me?!” I screamed
“SO WE CAN HAVE SOME FUN! THINK OF ALL THE THINGS WE CAN DO! BESIDES, ISN’T THIS KIND OF HOT FOR YOU?” Carly teased down at you as she twisted her feet. “SO LITTLE BOY, WHAT SHOULD WE DO FIRST?”
122.title: Carly

125.content: Who shrinks you at work?
125.title: Someone at work

info.brief_description: You shrink to an inch tall and you have to survive or have fun!
info.description:
John (you) shrinks to an inch with someone. It could be family, friends, even teachers! It can be with just about anyone and anywhere!

The rules are - no gay stuff, no giant men, no toilet stuff, no lesbian stuff. Would also prefer no vore but I'll certainly allow it. Also try to keep John alive as long as possible, but if he has to die then so be it!

Characters

John (you)

Julia - Your girlfriend. Always wearing the shortest jean shorts, flip flops, and a revealing tank top. Has a big butt with equally big boobs with a slightly pudgy but slim figure. Very gentle and timid.

Lauren - Julia's older sister. She's always been oddly seductive towards you, always touching you when she can. Always wearing thigh high boots and has perky breasts.

Brianna - Julia's mom. Known you as long as Carly has, even cares about you as much as she does. A bit stern as well

Carly - Your best friend. You guys have been friends since elementary school, and kind of have an on and off flirtatious relationship. She has smaller boobs but a gorgeous ass. Usually wearing yoga pants, barefoot, with a crop top on. Very playful and adventurous.

Hannah - Your mom. Always very over protective of you, but you've caught a devilish side of her every once in awhile. Typically wearing jeans barefoot with a tight t-shirt.

Paige - Your oldest sister. Extremely gorgeous, blonde hair, perfect boobs, perfect ass, perfect body and extremely nice. Probably the best person to find you at one inch. Always trying on bathing suits she ordered online.

Caroline - Your second oldest sister. Always been a bit cruel to you and always picked on you a bit. Humongous boobs, and an extremely tight body. Pretty good ass, however she hates bugs. She actually enjoys stepping or crushing them when she can.

Miss Sampson - Your teacher - you're an all star student in Miss Sampson's class and she always has some extra credit work for you to do. She's always wearing open toed black heels and a skin tight dress skirt that can barely handle her huge ass.

Miss Perry - Your other teacher. Has always had it out for you. Thinks you are a trouble maker and punishes you at every chance she has. Has her hair pulled back into a ponytail with black rimmed glasses. She wears a grey pantsuit with sandals.

Chloe - Your nerdy classmate. You don't know her very well, but she's very smart and very cute. She wears converses with sweatpants and a t-shirt that's a bit tight.

Ashley - Your boss. You get along with her generally and is usually in designer clothes.

Bella - Your goth co-worker. You can't tell if she likes you, always wearing something weird but hot.
